chrome.notes: In Chrome 79, this method stopped returning floats and returned integers to avoid fingerprinting.

chrome_android.notes: In Chrome for Android 79, this method stopped returning floats and returned integers to avoid fingerprinting.

opera.notes: In Opera 66, this method stopped returning floats and returned integers to avoid fingerprinting.

opera_android.notes: In Opera for Android 57, this method stopped returning floats and returned integers to avoid fingerprinting.

firefox.notes: Prior to version 59, the pending status was reported by a "pending" value returned from Animation.playState.

firefox_android.notes: Prior to version 59, the pending status was reported by a "pending" value returned from Animation.playState.

chrome.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

chrome_android.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

firefox.notes: Prior to Firefox 59, this property returned pending for Animations with incomplete asynchronous operations but as of Firefox 59 this is indicated by the separate Animation.pending property. This reflects recent changes to the specification.

firefox_android.notes: Prior to Firefox 59, this property returned pending for Animations with incomplete asynchronous operations but as of Firefox 59 this is indicated by the separate Animation.pending property. This reflects recent changes to the specification.

opera.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

opera_android.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

samsunginternet_android.notes: Before Samsung Internet 5.0/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Samsung Internet 5.0/Opera 37, it shows paused.

webview_android.notes: Before Chrome 50/Opera 37, this property returned idle for an animation that had not yet started. Starting with Chrome 50/Opera 37, it shows paused.

__compat.description: Browsers automatically remove indefinite filling animations
